name: Arianna Marin
tagline: Front-End Web Dev Student at Seattle University
body:
#Welcome to the work in progress portfolio page for Arianna Marin, novice front-end web developer

###Objective
To gain personal satisfaction in a front-end web development position in which I am constantly learning, adapting to change, and being challenged. I would love to apply my robust HTML/CSS skills towards real-world application. I will utilize my evolving abilities in a work environment while gaining experience in the web development industry.  
[email](mailto:marin.arianna@gmail.com)
[github](https://github.com/marinari)
[twitter](http://twitter.com/guavah_go)

###About
I am currently taking classes at Seattle University to become a certified web developer. I am self-motivated and I genuinely view coding as an opportunity to harness my skills, not as a chore. I started classes at Seattle University on the web development track in January. Before that, I did an extensive search looking for the perfect "coding school". I have attended numerous orientations for bootcamps. I feel proud and grateful that I found the Seattle U program. The robust curriculum builds a strong foundation for students to excel as web developers. It is not only about learning web technologies and learning how to code. It is about learning these skills in context of how it impacts consumers.

###Skills
The past jobs I've held have been primarily in administration and retail. Skills from these industries do not directly translate to the skills needed for a web developer. However, I still gained useful skills and experience from those jobs.
+ Over 3 years of customer service. I am comfortable talking to people in a pleasant, professional manner. I am comfortable resolving conflicts with customers.
+ Teamwork. I have experience working in small teams and coordinating with people in order to create an efficient and transparent work environment.
+ Organization. At my current job I have to manage various orders, filing, and tasks for a group of people. This forces me to be organized, things have to be ordered on time without gaps in supplies and my workspace has to be clear so other people can easily navigate it.
+ Avid, Passionate learner. I am a patient student and I see obstacles as an opportunity to learn. Working on class projects and practicing programming on my own is exciting to me.
+ Good Communication Skills: Active Listener. I make a conscious effort to fulling listen to information before responding. This allows me to understand the complete message that is communicated. 
          Technical Skills
            + Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign
            + Photography
            + HTML5, CSS3
            + Version Control: Git, Github
            + Social Media: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr

###Education
+ Currently: Seattle University [Web Development Certificate Program](http://webdev.seattleu.edu)    
+ Anticipated Graduation: Fall 2016  
+ Savannah College of Art and Design: BFA in Photography/Graphic Design minor Graduated: Nov 2013  
+ Study Abroad Hong Kong: Winter 2014  
      
**Relevant Coursework**
>Completed:  
>Foundations of the Web-Intro to the Internet and the World Wide Web  
>Intro to Web Development- basic principles of web development, intro to HTML and CSS  
>Currently:  
>Intro to Javascript Programming for the Web  
>Intro to Servers and Hosting  
>Upcoming:  
>Building Javascript Applications for the Web  
>User Science and Testing  
>Professional Practice  
>Web Development Capstone Project  
>[Full course descriptions](http://webdev.seattleu.edu/courses.html)  
---

###Projects
CSS Zen Garden
Create a new design for the demo website, and practice an approach to graphic and interface design.  
[Project Repository](https://github.com/marinari/wats1010-css-zen-garden)  
[Project](http://marinari.github.io/wats1010-css-zen-garden)  
Embedded Media  
The goal of this assignment is to explore the features and capabilities available for embedding multimedia in HTML5 documents. A single, "long scrolling", page will be created to promote the open source film, "Monkaa".  
[Project Repository](https://github.com/marinari/wats1010-embedded-media)  
[Project](http://marinari.github.io/wats1010-embedded-media)  
Advanced Markup  
The purpose of this assignment is to practice additional markup techniques, including presentation of tabular data in an accessible format, and the HTML/CSS interaction required to make page layouts work to elegantly organize and contain information.  
[Project Repository](https://github.com/marinari/wats1010-adv-markup)  
[Project](http://marinari.github.io/wats1010-adv-markup/)  
 
###Social Impact
I am passionate about programming and about breaking the mold of what a traditional developer is. The [#ILookLikeanEngineer](https://medium.com/the-coffeelicious/you-may-have-seen-my-face-on-bart-8b9561003e0f#.ldahherqm) hashtag was launched to challenge common misconceptions about who engineers are. The hashtag grew in popularity as women and people of color used it to share their experiences in an industry that is traditionally run by mostly white and Asian men. These types of social movements personally resonate with me and I look forward to redefining the parameters of what a programmer/ web developer can look like.

_Thank you for taking the time to learn more about me. Please contact me directly for references, questions, or just to have a conversation. I would love any feedback or suggestions._
© Arianna Marin 2016
